Which would be my responsibilities as Python Developer?

As a Python Developer in this role, your responsibilities would include developing and implementing high-quality software solutions, creating complex applications using cutting-edge programming features and frameworks, collaborating with other teams to define, design, and ship new features, brainstorming solutions to meet business goals, working on data engineering problems and building data pipelines, participating in the entire software development lifecycle, collaborating with cross-functional teams to solve complex problems, and writing clean and reusable code that can be easily maintained and scaled.
